activities: Personal information collected from customers is never sold or shared with an external organization.  The only instance where personal information is transmitted to a 3rd party is when required to process a credit card.  Anonymous customer web site usage information is transmitted to our analytics partners in order to see patterns and trends on how our web site is used.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For complaints that cannot be resolved between MXSAVE and the complainant, MXSAVE has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
